    • 方法详细资料

      • addCourseRelations

        void addCourseRelations(java.util.List<java.lang.String> relations)
        add some relations of courses (prerequisite)
        参数:
        relations - a list of strings representing the relations let "[CN]" stand for Course Number,
        If a course has no prerequisite courses, the format of the relation will be "[CN]", for example, if course A has no prerequisite courses, the relation is "A"
        Otherwise, the format of strings in relations list is "[CN1] [CN2] ... [CNn] [Count] [CN]",
        indicating that in this relation, selecting course "[CN]" requires Count courses in the n courses"[CN1]", ..., "[CNn]",
        for example, "C D 1 E" means that if one student wants to select "E", he/she has to learn any 1 course in "C" and "D".

      • addOneCourse

        void addOneCourse(java.lang.String courseInfo)
        Add a course into university
        参数:
        courseInfo - course number, course type, course credit of the added course. separated by spaces.
        the format of courseInfo: [number] [type] [credit]
        For example
        If courseInfo is "A 1 2", a course whose number is "A", type is 1 and credit is 2 will be added

      • addOneStudent

        void addOneStudent(java.lang.String studentInfo)
        Add a student into university.
        参数:
        studentInfo - student number, student's college of the added student. separated by spaces.
        The format of studentInfo for ArtsStudent: [number] [college]
        The format of studentInfo for ScienceStudent: [number] [college] [generalWeight] [artsWeight]
        For example
        If studentInfo is "4 1", he/she is a ArtsStudent with number is 4 and college is 1

      • checkGraduateForOneStudent

        boolean checkGraduateForOneStudent(int studentNumber)
        Check whether a student can graduate or not
        参数:
        studentNumber - the student number of the student need to check
        返回:
        true for yes, false for no

      • getAllCourses

        java.util.List<Course> getAllCourses()
        Get all courses that have been added into the university.
        返回:
        a list of courses

      • getAllStudents

        java.util.List<Student> getAllStudents()
        Get all students
        返回:
        a list of students

      • getCoursesOfOneStudentOrderByCourseNumber

        java.util.List<Course> getCoursesOfOneStudentOrderByCourseNumber(int studentNumber)
        Get all courses of a student
        参数:
        studentNumber - the student number of the student to be queried
        返回:
        a list of courses selected by the student ordered by course number

      • selectCourse

        boolean selectCourse(int studentNumber,
                     java.lang.String courseNumber)
        Student with student number studentNumber selects the course with course number courseNumber
        参数:
        studentNumber - the student number of the student who selects course
        courseNumber - the course number of the course the student wants to select
        返回:
        true for successful selection, false for otherwise

      • selectCourseByCollege

        void selectCourseByCollege(int college,
                           java.lang.String courseNumber)
        Select some course for all students in one college
        参数:
        college - college number of the college that wants to select course for students
        courseNumber - course number of the course that the college wants to select

      • showArtsANDScienceCount

        java.lang.String showArtsANDScienceCount()
        Count number of students in Science and Art
        返回:
        a string in format representing the number of students in two majors.
        The return type is ARTS-[arts count]-SCIENCE-[science count]
